sub-events.comment: Place the first pokemon picked by player1 on the left side of the layout.
Place the first pokemon picked by player2 on the right side of the layout.

events.comment: Set pokemon animation to idle if it is not doing anything

sub-events.comment: Player 1: [Switch pokemon step 1] Press Q to view switch options
Player 1: [Switch pokemon step 2] Press Space to switch pokemon
Player 2: [Switch pokemon step 1] Press PgUp to view switch options
Player 2: [Switch pokemon step 2] Press PgDn to switch pokemon
Player 1: [A to move to the left]
Player 2: [Left Arrow Key to move to the left]
Player 1: [D to move to the right]
Player 2: [Right Arrow Key to move to the right]
Player 1: [W to jump]
Player 2: [Up Arrow Key to jump]
Scale current hp of the active pokemon of player1 and set its corresponding hpbar image
Scale current hp of the active pokemon of player2 and set its corresponding hpbar image
Check if a pokemon has been hit by its opponent's power
Checks if a background attack is playing
Player 1: [Z for close range quick attack]
Player 2: [O for close range quick attack]
Player 1: [X for close range charge attack]
Player 2: [P for close range charge attack]
Player 1: [C for long range quick attack]
Player 2: [K for long range quick attack]
Player 1: [V for long range charge attack]
Player 2: [L for long range charge attack]

event-group.title: Removal of defeated pokemon from switch options
